title: oru varam
sahitya:
oru varam tandaruL ulaga nAyaki tiruvaDi maravAmal paNindu pugazhndu pADum


anupallavi

  tiruppArk-kaDal kaDai tirunNAL tanil tiru avadtAram sheida shrIdEvi enakku


caraNam    tAmarai malar tannil malarnda shen-tiru mAdE mAyavan
 maNimArbil magizhvuDan amarndhaay kAmanai InrAyE bhaktargaLin
 hrdaya kamalam amarndha aSta lakSmi svarUpiNi
